possibleValueList: Require extensive monitoring for Sleep Apnoea at Post Anaesthetic Recovery Unit
Require extensive monitoring beyond Post Anaesthetic Recovery Unit for Sleep Apnoea in a monitored unit ( HDU/ICU).
Require Pulse oximetry monitoring beyond Post Anaesthetic Recovery Unit for Sleep Apnoea in a non-monitored unit.
patient can be transferred from post anaesthetic recovery unit when stable
Patient requires 3 hour observation before sending out from post anaesthetic recovery unit
Discharge from SDC ( surgical day care) when stable
Do not discharge until further review by Anesthesiologist
Do Not Discharge Until Further Review By Surgeon
Discharge when the patient is stable and meets the discharge criteria
